results.name: Continued fraction for sqrt(31).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1).
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 18000); x=contfrac(sqrt(31)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b010129.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 04 2009
xref: Cf. A010486 Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 04 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
